metadata.title: FDC Renovations
metadata.description: FDC Renovations turns Your Project into Our Passion - From plumbing, electrical, framing to detailed millwork and final paint we provide turnkey profession.

Home.intro: Select the type of service you need!

metadata.title: FDC Renovations
metadata.description: FDC Renovations turns Your Project into Our Passion - From plumbing, electrical, framing to detailed millwork and final paint we provide turnkey profession.

ServicePage.serv1-intro:
Do you have a long list of small unfinished home projects or maybe some urgent needed repairs!
Our fix-it division is tailored to complete any misc project at very reasonable costs.
ServicePage.serv2-intro:
FDC has a complete experienced team to deliver full turnkey quality renovations on time and on budget. 
Whether it's a Bathroom, Kitchen, Basement or any other project we will guide you through the process.
ServicePage.serv3-intro:
Interior designers assisting and guiding customers through the design phase.
We will help you visualize and make your project come to life by making plans 
unique to their home and personnal tastes using 3D software.

sub-title.title4: 4) Staging and Home DecorSample Tables and swatches

menu.title: Basements
menu.description: Unfinished basements, repairs due to water damage or floods, room or bathroom addition, new flooring.

menu.title: Bathrooms
menu.description: Whether it’s a complete remodel or expansion or just a refresh, we will guide you though every step using only quality materials. The end result is a beautiful bathroom at costs that will surprise you – in a good way.

menu.title: Fireplaces
menu.description: Complete new custom installs or simple gas/wood/electric conversions. We can make your fireplace be a focal point using unique designs & materials that will catch everyone's eye.

menu.title: Kitchens
menu.description:
Open concepts and expansions or simple updates and refreshes.
Using stock cabinets & counter options for those on a tight budget or using custom high end materials, we will assist you to complete the most important space and add value to your home.

menu.title: Outdoor
menu.description:
Pergolas, Gazebos, small pool surrounds, large multilevel deck spaces using a variety of wood or composite materials such as TimberTech® , Trex®, Veranda®.
We also offer 3 season enclosure options using high quality fabrics such as Sunbrella®.

menu.title: Stairs
menu.description: Detailed millwork using any variety of hardwood or laminate materials with many color stain options on stairs and railings.

menu.title: Tilings
menu.description:
Mosaics, large/small formats, subway, textured, tile on tile.
We specialize in all tiling applications with professional quality installations for commercial or residential settings.
